description.value:
Your rage wells up from a dominant instinct - one you learned from a tradition or that comes naturally to you. Your instinct gives you an ability, requires you to avoid certain behaviours, grants you increased damage and resistances at higher levels, and allows you to select feats tied to your instinct.

  • @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.Animal Instinct]{Animal Instinct}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.Dragon Instinct]{Dragon Instinct}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.Fury Instinct]{Fury Instinct}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.Giant Instinct]{Giant Instinct}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.Spirit Instinct]{Spirit Instinct}
  • @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.Superstition Instinct]{Superstition Instinct}
